
$$mod1 : Median=\beta_1Date+\beta_0+e$$
$$mod2 : \log(Median)=\beta_1Date+\beta_0+e$$
$$modRace : \log(Median)=\beta_1Date*Race+\beta_0+e$$

```{r}
mod1=lm(Median~Date, data = Wages)
mod2=lm(log(Median)~Date, data = Wages)

WagesAll%>%
	ggplot(aes(x=Date, y=Median))+
	geom_point()+
	geom_smooth(se=FALSE, method = lm)
```

```{r}
mod1=lm(Median~Date,
				data=Wages%>%
					filter(is.na(Race),is.na(Gender))
)
mod2=lm(Median~Date,
				data=Wages%>%
					filter(Race=="black",is.na(Gender))
)

stargazer(mod1, mod2,
	header=FALSE,
	type=knittype,
  title="Model comparison, 'wage' equation",
  keep.stat="n",digits=2, single.row=TRUE,
  intercept.bottom=FALSE
)

anova(mod1, mod2)%>%
	kable()

```
